text: Niumba is an online marketplace for arranging or offering lodging, primarily homestays. The website has 334,000 listings, 22% of which are located in Spain. It is a subsidiary of TripAdvisor. ==History== Niumba was formed in 2005 by Grupo Intercom, a Barcelona based business incubator, with María José González-Barros as the co-founder. In 2013, it was acquired by TripAdvisor. ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:Tripadvisor Category:Spanish travel websites Category:Hospitality companies established in 2005 Category:Real estate companies established in 2005 Category:Internet properties established in 2005 Category:Vacation rental Category:2005 establishments in Spain
title: Niumba
